channel.title: [508] ZGS Special attack [508]
channel.description:
Hello, Some of you may know me, But for those who don't I'm [i]Mad_Moparscapian[/i], Well my problem is, When i do the Zamorak Godsword Special attack, It doesn't show the Barrage and doesn't freeze the enemy..
How do i do this??

item.title: [508] ZGS Special attack [508]
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:8, topic:276549”][quote author=Girona link=topic=365213.msg2770518#msg2770518 date=1241096504]
~[Also you need to learn Java]~
[/quote]
True, which is why he’s posting in here.[/quote]
No, he thinks his project is 100% perfect and everyone loves it, but he posts here for help on the easiest things known to 317’s and 508’s

Read full topic

item.title: [508] ZGS Special attack [508]
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Girona:

~[Also you need to learn Java]~

True, which is why he’s posting in here.

Anyway, you need to add:

p2.requestGFX(p, 369);
p2.freezeDelay = 20;

If you get errors (shouldn’t do) then make it understand p2.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] ZGS Special attack [508]
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

I would be glad to help, but no, you didn’t understand shit I was saying on MSN, then you started going “search whatever your project name was, forgot, and you will see what I am capable of” I said I already have, seriously, no one likes it, I told you it’s a piece of shit, you blocked me?
So yes, I would of helped if you didn’t block me

~[Also you need to learn Java]~

item.title: [508] ZGS Special attack [508]
item.dc:creator: @Zeroh Zeroh
item.description:
@Zeroh wrote:

Okay sorry I was using my source but here’s what yours should look like

               } else if (p.equipment[3] == 11700 && p.specialAmount >= 75) { // Zamorak godsword.
                    hitDamage = Misc.random(
                            (int) (maxMeleeHit(p) * 1.1));
                    p.usingSpecial = True;
                    p.specialAmount -= 45;
                    p.requestAnim(7070, 0);
                    p.requestGFX(1221, 0);

Lol all you need to do is change the p.usingSpecial = False; to p.usingSpecial = True;

Read full topic

item.title: [508] ZGS Special attack [508]
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Sorry but this doesn’t really help me…

This is what it looks like currently

} else if (p.equipment[3] == 11700 && p.specialAmount >= 75) { // Zamorak godsword. hitDamage = Misc.random( (int) (maxMeleeHit(p) * 1.1)); p.usingSpecial = false; p.specialAmount -= 45; p.requestAnim(7070, 0); p.requestGFX(1221, 0);

Read full topic

item.title: [508] ZGS Special attack [508]
item.dc:creator: @Zeroh Zeroh
item.description:
@Zeroh wrote:

Okay you want to go in your PlayerCombat.java And find like bgs or other things and add this…

case 11700: /** * Zamorak Godsword */ p.requestGFX(1221, 0); p.damageSpecDelay = 1; n.requestGFX(369, 0); p.enableSpecDamage = true; p.requestAnim(7070, 0); isSpecWep = true; break;

Hope I helped you.

Read full topic
